original_text:
but no stranger had to spend the night in the street,
    for my door was always open to the traveler—
korean_text: 실상은 나그네가 거리에서 자지 아니하도록 나는 행인에게 내 문을 열어 주었노라

sentences.original_text: but no stranger had to spend the night in the street
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나그네는 거리에서 밤을 보내야 하지 않았으니

sentences.original_text: for my door was always open to the traveler
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 문은 여행자에게 항상 열려 있었기 때문이니라
